uberV1

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • uberV1.Manager

  • public class Manager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all the overhead for requesting and tracking rides.
    Author:
    jterrito

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Manager()
      Initializes manager without any users using the default price rate(1) and time rate(1) as well as input from command line.
      Manager(double rate, double time)
      Initializes manager without any users, using the given price rate and time rate as well as input from the command line.
      Manager(double rate, double time, java.util.Scanner scanner)
      Initializes manager without any users.
      Manager(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Driver> drivers, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Client> clients, java.util.ArrayList<Ride> rides, java.util.Scanner scanner)
      Initializes manager with preset values.
      Manager(java.util.Scanner scanner)
      Initializes manager with given input.

      Creates a ride for a client and requests drivers for the ride.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Manager

        public Manager()
        Initializes manager without any users using the default price rate(1) and time rate(1) as well as input from command line.

      • Manager

        public Manager(double rate,
               double time)
        Initializes manager without any users, using the given price rate and time rate as well as input from the command line.
        Parameters:
        rate - Price Rate to be used in price calculations.
        time - Time Rate to be used in time calculations.

      • Manager

        public Manager(double rate,
               double time,
               java.util.Scanner scanner)
        Initializes manager without any users. Uses given price rate, time rate, and input method.
        Parameters:
        rate - Price rate to be used in price calculations.
        time - Time rate to be used in time calculations.
        scanner - Input method for user responses.

      • Manager

        public Manager(java.util.Scanner scanner)
        Initializes manager with given input.
        Parameters:
        scanner - Source for input.

      • Manager

        public Manager(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Driver> drivers,
               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Client> clients,
               java.util.ArrayList<Ride> rides,
               java.util.Scanner scanner)
        Initializes manager with preset values. For testing.
        Parameters:
        drivers - List of current drivers.
        clients - List of current clients.
        rides - List of current rides.
        scanner - Source for input.

        public Ride receiveRequest(Client client,
                           java.awt.Point destination)
        Creates a ride for a client and requests drivers for the ride.
        Parameters:
        client - The client requesting the ride.
        destination - The destination for the ride.
        Returns:
        Returns the ride that the client requested.

      • transaction

        public boolean transaction(Ride ride)
        Charges client and pays driver based off price of ride.
        Parameters:
        ride - The ride that is being payed for.
        Returns:
        Returns whether or not the transaction succeeded.

      • checkRides

        Provides output to update client on the status of their ride.
